server module¶

Flask server to allow React application to interact with python scripts

server.add_labels()¶

Run classification with new labels and return predictions.

Returns

Response object containing prediction data within JSON object

server.get_data()¶

Return the current label and prediction data from json data files.

Returns

Response object containing JSON data object. Object contains:

  • labelled: boolean, true if document label data is present

  • labelledDocs: object, contains document label data

  • predictions: object, contains document prediction data

  • docs: object, contains document text content

server.reset_data()¶

Reset the current label and prediction data.

Returns

Empty 204 response object
